channel.title: CA on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in CA on Morgoth

item.title: CA
item.description: CA Certificate Authority. 创建自签名证书 创建x509证书: 1 $ openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ca.key -out ca.crt -subj "/CN=k8s.devops.com/O=k8s.devops.com" 查看证书有效期: 1 $ openssl x509 -in /etc/ssl/ca.domain.com.crt -noout -dates
